definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: He writes dialog ue by cut monologue in two.
sentences.chinese: 他把獨白切成兩截來寫對白。

sentences.english: The actor's soliloquies were all very boring.
sentences.chinese: 演員的全部獨白都是十分令人厭煩的。

sentences.english: Even when the more appropriate word is monologue, the same format applies.
sentences.chinese: 即便是獨白，也可採用同樣的格式。

sentences.english: The first one is a Hamlet soliloquy.
sentences.chinese: 第一個是《哈姆雷特》的一段獨白。

sentences.english: In the first elegy there are two monologues from two different speakers.
sentences.chinese: 在第一悲歌有兩個獨白從兩個不同的發言者。

sentences.english: You don't have to listen year after year to the same monologues.
sentences.chinese: 你不必年復一年地聽同樣的獨白。

sentences.english: This is a monologue by a worker, a mower.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個割草者的獨白。

sentences.english: It follows in soliloquies the lives of six persons from childhood to old age.
sentences.chinese: 它以獨白的形式寫了六個人從童年到晚年的生活。

sentences.english: Such as Hamlet's famous soliloquy, full of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 如哈姆雷特的著名獨白，富有哲理性。

sentences.english: Chapter Five reveals the indeterminacy of interpretation of Browning's dramatic monologue.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分揭示了布朗寧戲劇性獨白闡釋的不確定性。

sentences.english: The best part of this book is Adrien's narration.
sentences.chinese: 小說最棒的部分是阿德里安的獨白。

sentences.english: The first one is a Hamlet soliloquy.
sentences.chinese: 第一個是哈姆雷特獨白。

sentences.english: She also pays attention to the language functions, like the characters' conversations, soliloquies and so on.
sentences.chinese: 她還十分注重人物對話和獨白等語言功能。

sentences.english: Monologue interviewers are a major challenge.
sentences.chinese: 獨白的面試官是一個重大挑戰。

sentences.english: The writer of the paper is good at portraying characters through dynamic description and the soliloquy of inner world.
sentences.chinese: 善於用細節，動態描寫和內心獨白來刻畫人物。

sentences.english: Telling the true story of the world in interior monolog.
sentences.chinese: 以內心獨白敘說今世的真實故事。

definition: in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to whisper in sb's ear/a whisper
to recount/to tell of/to relate/(fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
